title: Hash Cracking Workflow
description:
MD5 hashes were trivial to crack offline.

Objective: Crack an MD5 hash, then migrate storage to bcrypt or SHA-256 salted.
dialogue: Mira: "We need stronger hashing algorithms for storage."
Mira: "Can you help me migrate to a more secure hash?"
hints: Use John the Ripper on the hash file.
